sentences: On the development and transfer of technologies, delegates considered the technology information system, which includes an inventory of environmentally sound technologies and a prototype web-based clearinghouse.
SWITZERLAND and the EU supported holding an expert meeting.
SAUDI ARABIA, supported by CHINA, PERU and PANAMA, stressed the need for actual transfer of technology in addition to information.
Chair Dovland said informal consultations would be held to prepare draft conclusions.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
